name: Pay Respects (aaron7eleven)
description:
You play as Lenny the ghost, who became a human in a dream when he wanted to honor the deceased. Pay your respects to the dead to be gifted the ability to transform back into a ghost and pick items up as a human. Help people along the way and honor the elder at the top of the mountain.

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys  - Move

Mouse - Look

Transform between Ghost & Human - Space 

Pick Up Item & Pay Respects - F

Submission for r/SoloDevelopment Halloween Jam 2021 here. 

Theme: Ghost doing normal people things
